description: The 16-year-old actress stood out as she attended the Marvel Avengers Academy Party at the Teagram Ballroom in Los Angeles on Wednesday. The Mad Men star showed off her unique style.
title: Kiernan Shipka embraces patterns in bold orange butterfly dress
title_page: Kiernan Shipka embraces patterns in bold orange butterfly dress | Daily Mail Online
text:
Kiernan Shipka showed she's not afraid to mix patterns.
The 16-year-old actress stood out as she attended the Marvel Avengers Academy Party at the Teagram Ballroom in Los Angeles on Wednesday.
The former Mad Men star wore a bright dress with an orange butterfly design as she arrived at the bash.
Stylish: Kiernan Shipka wore a pretty patterned dress as she attended the Marvel Avengers Academy party in Los Angeles on Wednesday
Kiernan appeared to be in a good mood, grinning as she arrived at the party for a new mobile app game.
The budding style icon's dress featured a colorful butterfly design on the chest and sheer sleeves, while the mid-length skirt featured a black, orange and white diamond pattern.
The teenager wore her blonde hair down in a center part, and finished off her look with dark eyeliner and pink lipstick.
Big smile: The 16-year-old beamed as she arrived at the bash
Kiernan kept her accessorizes simple, wearing a single silver ring and flashing a classic red manicure.
The actress gave her petite frame a boost with black platform heels with peep toes and thin ankle straps.
Also attending the party in LA were future Baywatch actor Alexandra Daddario and Arrow star Colton Haynes.
Bold choice: The budding style icon looked pretty in a distinctive dress with a butterfly pattern on the chest and diamond design on the skirt
Alexandra flashed a bit of skin in a sheer black bodysuit worn under low slung black pants.
The San Andreas star added a long tuxedo-style jacket with a shimmering silver trim on the lapel, and added black patterned heels.
The 29-year-old who can currently be seen in Nicholas Sparks adaptation The Choice, looked relaxed as she rested her hands in her pockets and flashed a big smile.
Black ensemble: Actress Alexandra Daddario wore a sheer bodysuit and tuxedo jacket
Also attending the event was Arrow star Colton Haynes, 27, who opted for casual style in a polka dot shirt, black leather jacket and ripped jeans.
The actor caused a stir on social media earlier this month when he appeared to confirm he was gay after a fan mentioned his 'secret gay past.'
'Was it a secret? Let's all just enjoy life & have no regrets,' he Tweeted in response.
